title: S&S Worldwide Jumbo Ludo Game. Kids Will Love Giant 40" Sqaure Vinyl Game Mat and 5" Inflatable Movement Die.
features: EVERYBODY LOVES JUMBO GAMES : Big board, big fun!
A CLASSIC GAME FOR ALL : Ludo is similar to the game "Trouble", and just as fun!
GAME PLAY : Can be played in teams or individuals! Enough for the whole group!
THE BIGGER THE BETTER : Our huge square vinyl play mat measures at a jumbo 40"!
EVERYTHING IS INCLUDED : Each game includes play mat, counters, spinner, inflatable die, and rules!
description: Big board, big fun similar to the game trouble, teams or individuals move 2-1/4 inch counters around the 40 inch square vinyl play mat. It's a tactical game that your whole Group will love includes play mat, counters, spinner, inflatable die and rules. For 2 to 4 players, ages 5+.
